DOC.brief_summary: Open label study evaluate efficacy CURE-EX device treatment onychomycosis .
DOC.detailed_description: Each affect nail treat twice daily 24-30 week . Efficacy evaluate measure growth healthy nail .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects diagnose clinical mycological onychomycosis ( culture smear ) . 2 . Subjects receive topical antifungal treatment 14 day prior commence study . 3 . Subjects receive systemic antifungal treatment 3 month prior start study . 1. lunula infect onychomycosis . 2 . Pregnant breast feed female .
